resources.string: Translation has been pasted to the clipboard

I am giving the Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics, Faculty of Mathematics and Physics, Charles Univeristy (UFAL MFF UK) consent to collect my inputs and translations. The texts will be anonymized and may be used for future development of the system.
The Translator was developed at the Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics, Faculty of Mathematics and Physics, Charles University and was supported by the LINDAT/CLARIAH-CZ project.

Development of the translation system: Martin Popel, Jindřich Libovický, Jindřich Helcl, Michal Novák, Rudolf Rosa, Zdeněk Kasner

Data preparation: Lucie Poláková, Martin Majliš, Denys Bojko, Tomáš Musil, Tereza Chlaňová, Oxana Čmelíková, Martin Popel
Many thanks to korpus.cz for providing us with InterCorp v14, a part of the project Czech National Corpus.

Back-end development: Ondřej Košarko and the Lindat team

Front-end created by: David Nápravník, Barbora Strihová, Ivan Lysianok, Michal Fogelman, Jan Marek, Michal Pešat

Android development: Tomáš Krabač

For any questions about this Translator, please contact %1$s.
During translation, the texts are automatically saved and you can see their history here.
Save your favorite translations from history (star icon). You can then find them on this screen.

I am giving the Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics, Faculty of Mathematics and Physics, Charles Univeristy (UFAL MFF UK) consent to collect my inputs and translations. The texts will be anonymized and may be used for future development of the system.
Use better network text-to-speech whenever available.
There was an error when converting text to speech. We recommend installing the Speech Services by Google app from Google Play
The application is not up to date
Sorry, but the app needs to be updated, otherwise it can no longer work
